thread.title: Latham & Watkins Moving Their New York Offices

author: Keiko Morris
title: Latham & Watkins Moving Their New York Offices
text:
One of the world’s top-grossing law firms has signed a lease to relocate its New York City office to a Sixth Avenue tower undergoing a major overhaul, underscoring the demand for new or modernized space and boosting the Midtown office corridor’s run of large corporate lease deals.
Law firm Latham & Watkins LLP late last week closed a deal to take 407,000 square feet at the former Time & Life Building, now called 1271 Avenue of the Americas, according to the tower’s owner, Rockefeller Group. Latham plans to leave behind... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
